item.title:

item.title: African elephants often bury dead or sleeping human. A Kenyan woman once fell asleep under a tree and woke up to find an elephant gently touching her. As other elephants arrived they buried her under branches. She was found the next morning unharmed https://t.co/VMI6c9TEyb https://t.co/9ykhwxIBXf

item.title:
How does #SARSCoV2 infect #macrophages?
